title: 2025 Volkswagen Group Sales Show EV Revolution Is Still Moving Forward
description:
Volkswagen Group saw strong sales in 2025 and now has nearly a 20% market share in Germany. New EVs are coming in 2026.

The post 2025 Volkswagen Group Sales Show EV Revolution Is Still Moving Forward appeared first on CleanTechnica.
